issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
soft98.ir is no longer usable!

Someone "@SMostafaMoosavi" totally destroyed the ability of users to use soft98.ir.

For two weeks I had removed absolutely all rules from "my filters" and was only with the filter lists - the main ones. Until 2 days ago, the site was being used correctly. But that was until then!

(Just one note - I had an account there for several years, but what they did - I don't know, but I couldn't log into my account. When trying to reset my password - beam - it asks me to enter Arabic characters. For Europeans, this is to enter Arabic characters it's ridiculous! I couldn't even log into my profile... The site is ungenerous!)

Now soft98.ir is totally unusable! This site was among my favorites!

Someone "@SMostafaMoosavi" has totally destroyed the normal use of the site with his obscenities!

I struggled for 2 years, but I got this far!

I'm removing the checkmark and won't use soft98.ir anymore!
